metadataAttributes.Title: Supply Market Analysis
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course you will learn some tools to evaluate supply markets from a  Strategic  level  (e.g. Macro) (PESTLE) to Tactical level (e.g. Industry)  (Supply Market Segmentation, Five Forces, Supply Chain Mapping) to Operational Level (Supplier)  (Informational Sources,  SWOT, Financial Analysis)
